convexhull.comparators

Class AngleComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • convexhull.comparators.AngleComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double>

    public class AngleComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double>
    Provides comparator for sorting points by their polar angle, in increasing order.

        public AngleComparator(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double pole)

    • Method Detail

      • compare

        public int compare(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point1,
          java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point2)
        Comparing method for two points.
        Specified by:
        compare in interface java.util.Comparator<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double>
        Parameters:
        point1 - point 1 to compare
        point2 - point 2 to compare
        Returns:
        -1 if polar angle of point1 is smaller than the polar angle of point2 1 if it's the other way around and 0 if the angles are equal
